actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on 1,3-diisocyanatomethylbenzene, polymer with 1,6-diisocyanatohexane.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of 1,3-diisocyanatomethylbenzene, polymer with 1,6- diisocyanatohexane, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such article.

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on 1,3-diisocyanatomethylbenzene, polymer with 1,6-diisocyanatohexane.
